sn4.20:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava kosalesu viharati himavantapadese arannakutikayam.
sn4.20:1.2: Atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
sn4.20:1.3: “sakka nu kho rajjam karetum ahanam aghatayam ajinam ajapayam asocam asocapayam dhammena”ti?
sn4.20:2.1: Atha kho maro papima bhagavato cetasa cetoparivitakkamannaya yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn4.20:2.2: “karetu, bhante, bhagava rajjam, karetu, sugato, rajjam ahanam aghatayam ajinam ajapayam asocam asocapayam dhammena”ti.
sn4.20:2.3: “Kim pana me tvam, papima, passasi yam mam tvam evam vadesi:
sn4.20:2.4: ‘karetu, bhante, bhagava rajjam, karetu sugato, rajjam ahanam aghatayam ajinam ajapayam asocam asocapayam dhammena’”ti?
sn4.20:2.5: “Bhagavata kho, bhante, cattaro iddhipada bhavita bahulikata yanikata vatthukata anutthita paricita susamaraddha.
sn4.20:2.6: Akankhamano ca, bhante, bhagava himavantam pabbatarajam suvannam tveva adhimucceyya suvannanca panassa”ti.
sn4.20:5.1: Atha kho maro papima “janati mam bhagava, janati mam sugato”ti dukkhi dummano tatthevantaradhayiti.
